Package thijzert.chatty.client.gui.scene

Class ConnectScene

java.lang.Object
thijzert.chatty.client.gui.scene.ConnectScene
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChattyScene
public class ConnectScene extends Object implements ChattyScene
In this scene you can connect to the server. It implements ChattyScene.
Author:
Thijzert

      public ConnectScene(WindowData windowData)
